myHobbies: I love listening to music and learning new technologies
whyProgramming: When I was 13, my dream was actually to become a hacker (blackhat), but my mom would always nag me, saying, "Why do you always want to hack into your friends Facebook accounts? It's bad." I was just thinking how cool it would be :D Then I discovered JavaScript and told myself, "OMG, I can create a Facebook clone and hack my friends accounts!" Hahahaha, just kidding. I actually just want to be a professional developer and work in the field because THIS IS MY LIFE. Thank you for reading, see you soon.
